siteMetadata.title: Aldrich Huang
siteMetadata.description: I am CEO and co-founder of UXTesting.io, founder of SavvyUXer, as well as the main organizer of the Savvy UX Summit. With several years of working experiences in the field of legal, business development, and customer experience, and I firmly believe that better user experience will bring joy to your users.
siteMetadata.author: Aldrich Huang
